canonical_explanation.text: A family is a group of people who love and care for each other. Family members include mother, father, brothers, sisters, and grandparents. We live together in a house. A house has different rooms like bedroom, kitchen, bathroom, and living room. Each room is used for different things.
rules: A family has people who love and care for each other.
Family members include parents, siblings, and grandparents.
A small family has fewer members, a big family has many members.
A house has different rooms for different uses.
We need food, clothes, and shelter to live.

questions.question_text: Who is the mother's husband?
questions.explanation_correct: The mother's husband is the father. In a family, the mother and father are married and live together with their children.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The father is not the brother, grandfather, or uncle. The father is the husband of the mother. They are the parents of the children in the family.

questions.question_text: Who is your father's mother?
questions.explanation_correct: Your father's mother is your grandmother. This means that your grandmother is the mother of your father.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Your father's mother is not your mother, sister, or aunt. Your grandmother is the mother of your father, and she is your father's mother.

questions.question_text: Who is your mother's father?
questions.explanation_correct: Your mother's father is your grandfather. This is because your mother's father is the father of your mother, who is your parent.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Your father is not your grandfather. Your grandfather is the father of your mother or father. Your uncle is your parent's brother, not your grandfather. Your brother is your sibling, not your grandfather.

questions.question_text: A family with mother, father, and one child is called a ___ family.
questions.explanation_correct: A small family is a family with only a mother, father, and one child. This is the right answer because a family with more people, like grandparents or many children, is called a big or joint family.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct answer is B) Small. A small family has only a mother, father, and one child. The other options are not correct. A 'big' family has more people like grandparents or many children. A 'joint' family lives together with grandparents, aunts, uncles, and cousins. A 'sad' family is not a real type of family.

questions.question_text: A family with grandparents, parents, uncles, and cousins living together is called a ___ family.
questions.explanation_correct: A big or joint family is when many relatives like grandparents, parents, uncles, and cousins all live together in the same house. This is called a big or joint family because there are many family members living together.
questions.explanation_incorrect: A small family is when only the parents and their children live together. A tiny family is very small, like just a mother and child. A lonely family is when someone lives all by themselves with no other family members. But the correct answer is a big or joint family, where many relatives like grandparents, parents, uncles, and cousins all live together in the same house.

questions.question_text: In which room do we cook food?
questions.explanation_correct: We cook food in the kitchen because that's the room where we have the stove, oven, and other things we need to make our meals.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The kitchen is the room where we cook our food. We don't cook in the bedroom, because that's where we sleep. We also don't cook in the bathroom, because that's where we take baths and brush our teeth. And we don't cook in the living room, because that's where we relax and spend time with our family.

questions.question_text: In which room do we sleep?
questions.explanation_correct: We sleep in the bedroom. The bedroom is the special room in our house where we go to rest and sleep at night.
questions.explanation_incorrect: We do not sleep in the kitchen, bathroom, or garden. The kitchen is where we cook food, the bathroom is where we take a bath, and the garden is outside our house. The bedroom is the right room where we sleep and rest.

questions.question_text: In which room do we take a bath?
questions.explanation_correct: We take a bath in the bathroom. The bathroom is the room in our house where we have a bathtub or shower to clean ourselves.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The bedroom is where we sleep, and the living room is where we sit and play. The kitchen is where we cook food, not where we take a bath. The correct answer is the bathroom, because that is the room in our house designed for taking a bath.

questions.question_text: Where does the family sit together and watch TV?
questions.explanation_correct: The family sits together in the living room to watch TV. The living room is the place in the house where the family gathers to relax and spend time together, like watching TV.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The family does not sit in the bathroom, kitchen, or store room to watch TV. These rooms are used for other purposes, like bathing, cooking, and storing things. The living room is the right place in the house where the family can sit together comfortably and watch TV.

questions.question_text: Which of these do we need to live?
questions.explanation_correct: We need food, clothes, and shelter to live. These things help us stay healthy and safe. Toys, TV, and games are nice to have, but they are not the most important things we need to live.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Food, clothes, and shelter are the things we need to live. Toys, TV, and games are fun, but they are not necessary for our survival. We need food to give us energy, clothes to keep us warm, and a house or shelter to protect us from the weather.

questions.question_text: Ravi has one brother. How many children are there in his family?
questions.explanation_correct: Ravi has one brother, so there are 2 children in his family. The total number of children is 2, which is option B.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The question says that Ravi has one brother, so there are 2 children in his family. Option A is incorrect because it says there is only 1 child. Option C is incorrect because it says there are 3 children, and option D is incorrect because it says there are 4 children. The correct answer is option B, which says there are 2 children.

questions.question_text: Your mother's mother is your ___.
questions.explanation_correct: Your mother's mother is your grandmother. This is because your grandmother is the mother of your mother, and she is part of your family.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Your mother's mother is not your aunt, sister, or friend. Your aunt is your mother's sister, your sister is your parent's child, and your friend is someone you know and play with. Your grandmother is your mother's mother, and she is part of your family.

questions.question_text: Who takes care of us when we are sick?
questions.explanation_correct: Our family takes care of us when we are sick. Family members like our parents, grandparents, and siblings help us feel better when we are not feeling well.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Strangers would not take care of us when we are sick. Only our family members who love us can give us the care and attention we need when we are not feeling well. Toys cannot take care of us either.

questions.question_text: Where do we keep our clothes?
questions.explanation_correct: We keep our clothes in the cupboard or wardrobe in our bedroom. This is where we store all our shirts, pants, dresses, and other clothing items.
questions.explanation_incorrect: We do not keep our clothes in the kitchen or the bathroom. The kitchen is where we cook food, and the bathroom is where we take a bath. The right place to store our clothes is in the cupboard or wardrobe in our bedroom.

questions.question_text: What do we use to sit on?
questions.explanation_correct: We use a chair to sit on. Chairs are special furniture pieces made for sitting. They have a flat surface to put our bottom on and a back to support our body.
questions.explanation_incorrect: A bed is used for sleeping, not sitting. A stove is used for cooking food, not sitting. A bathtub is used for taking a bath, not sitting. The correct answer is a chair, which is the right furniture piece to sit on.

questions.question_text: Mother is making food. Where is she?
questions.explanation_correct: Mother is making food in the kitchen. The kitchen is the room in the house where people cook and prepare food.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Mother is not in the bedroom, bathroom, or garden. The kitchen is the room in the house where Mother cooks and prepares food. That is why the correct answer is B, Kitchen.

questions.question_text: Father is sleeping. Where is he?
questions.explanation_correct: Father is sleeping in the bedroom. The bedroom is the room where people sleep.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Father is not sleeping in the kitchen, bathroom, or on the street. Those are not the places where people sleep. The correct answer is the bedroom, because that is the room where people rest and sleep.

questions.question_text: What should family members do for each other?
questions.explanation_correct: Family members should love and help each other because that's what families do. They care for each other and work together as a team.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Family members should not fight, ignore or be mean to each other. That's not how families should behave. Families need to love and support each other to be happy and healthy.

questions.question_text: What do we need when it rains and we are outside?
questions.explanation_correct: When it rains and we are outside, we need an umbrella to keep ourselves dry and protect us from the rain.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Sunglasses are used to protect our eyes from the bright sun, not the rain. A swimming suit is used for swimming in the water, not to keep us dry from the rain. Sandals are shoes we wear, but they do not protect us from the rain like an umbrella does.

questions.question_text: Priya lives with her parents, grandparents, uncle, aunt, and cousin. What type of family does she have?
questions.explanation_correct: Priya lives with her parents, grandparents, uncle, aunt, and cousin. This is called a joint family, where many family members live together in the same house and care for each other.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Priya does not have a small family, because a small family has only parents and children. She also does not have no family, because she lives with many family members. And an animal family is a group of animals, not humans, living together.

questions.question_text: What do we sleep on?
questions.explanation_correct: We sleep on a bed. Beds are special furniture made for sleeping on. They are soft and comfortable, so we can rest and sleep well at night.
questions.explanation_incorrect: A chair is for sitting, a table is for placing things on, and a stove is used for cooking. We don't sleep on these. We sleep on a bed, which is a piece of furniture designed specifically for sleeping.

questions.question_text: Who is your parent's son?
questions.explanation_correct: Your parent's son is your brother or you if you are a boy. This is because brothers are family members who have the same parents as you.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Your sister is not your parent's son. A sister is a girl who has the same parents as you. Your grandmother is your parent's mother, not their son. An aunt is your parent's sister, not their son either. The correct answer is your brother or you, if you are a boy, because they are your parent's son.

questions.question_text: Where do you wash your face?
questions.explanation_correct: You wash your face in the bathroom. The bathroom has a sink and water to help you clean your face.
questions.explanation_incorrect: You do not wash your face in the kitchen, bedroom, or living room. These rooms are for other activities like cooking, sleeping, and relaxing. The bathroom is the special room with a sink and water to help you wash your face.

questions.question_text: Who usually reads you bedtime stories?
questions.explanation_correct: Family members, like your parents or grandparents, usually read you bedtime stories because they love you and want to help you sleep well.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Strangers would not read you bedtime stories because they don't know you. Animals also cannot read, so they cannot read you stories. If no one reads you bedtime stories, you might have trouble falling asleep. Your family members are the ones who care for you and help you go to bed.

questions.question_text: What do we eat food on?
questions.explanation_correct: We eat food on a plate. Plates are special dishes that help us hold our food and eat it easily.
questions.explanation_incorrect: We do not eat food on the bed or the floor. That would be messy! We also do not eat food in a bucket. Plates are the right way to hold our food and eat it properly.

questions.question_text: Amit lives with only his mother and father. What type of family is this?
questions.explanation_correct: This is a small family because Amit lives with only his mother and father, and not with any other family members like brothers, sisters, or grandparents. A small family has just a few people living together, like parents and their children.
questions.explanation_incorrect: This is not a big family or a joint family. A big family has many people like parents, children, grandparents, and other relatives all living together. A joint family is when the whole extended family, including grandparents, aunts, uncles, and cousins, live in the same house. Amit's family is a small family because it has only his mother and father, and not any other family members.

questions.question_text: We should keep our home ___.
questions.explanation_correct: We should keep our home clean because a clean home is healthy and safe for us. Dirt and mess can make us sick, so we need to keep our home tidy and clean.
questions.explanation_incorrect: We should not keep our home dirty, messy, or dark. A dirty home can have germs that can make us sick. A messy home can be unsafe if we trip over things. A dark home is hard to see in and can be dangerous. The best way to keep our home is clean and bright so we can play and live comfortably.

questions.question_text: Who cooks food for us at home?
questions.explanation_correct: Family members like mother and father cook food for us at home. They prepare delicious meals in the kitchen for us to enjoy.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The TV, car, and house cannot cook food for us. Only the people who live with us in our home, like our family members, can prepare the food we eat.

questions.question_text: What room has a stove for cooking?
questions.explanation_correct: The kitchen has a stove for cooking. We use the stove in the kitchen to make food like rice, daal, and vegetables.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The bedroom, living room, and bathroom do not have a stove for cooking. The kitchen is the room that has a stove, where we can cook our meals.

questions.question_text: Your parent's daughter is your ___.
questions.explanation_correct: Your parent's daughter is your sister. If you are a girl, you are also your parent's daughter, so you are your own sister.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Your brother is not your parent's daughter, so the answer 'brother' is incorrect. Your grandfather is your parent's parent, not your sibling, so the answer 'grandfather' is also incorrect. Your uncle is your parent's brother, not your sibling, so the answer 'uncle' is incorrect.

questions.question_text: Mother and father are our parents.
questions.explanation_correct: Mother and father are our parents because they are the people who take care of us and love us. They help us grow up and learn new things.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Mother and father are not our parents. Our parents are the people who give birth to us and take care of us. Mother and father are the correct answer because they are our parents.

questions.question_text: Grandparents are younger than our parents.
questions.explanation_correct: Grandparents are older than our parents. This is because our parents are the children of our grandparents.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Grandparents are not younger than our parents. Grandparents are the parents of our parents, so they are older. Our parents are the children of our grandparents.

questions.question_text: A joint family has many members.
questions.explanation_correct: A joint family has many members like parents, grandparents, and their children all living together in one house. This is true because a joint family has a lot of people who love and care for each other.
questions.explanation_incorrect: A nuclear family has just a few members like parents and their children. This is not true for a joint family, which has many more people like grandparents and other relatives living together in the same house. A joint family is bigger and has more members than a nuclear family.

questions.question_text: We cook food in the bedroom.
questions.explanation_correct: We do not cook food in the bedroom. The kitchen is the room where we cook and prepare food.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The bedroom is where we sleep and rest. It is not the right place to cook food. Cooking should be done in the kitchen, which is the special room in the house for preparing meals.

questions.question_text: We sleep in the bedroom.
questions.explanation_correct: Yes, we sleep in the bedroom. The bedroom is the room in our house where we go to sleep and rest.
questions.explanation_incorrect: No, we do not sleep in the living room or the kitchen. We sleep in the bedroom because that is the room in our house that is designed for sleeping and resting.

questions.question_text: A bed is used for sleeping.
questions.explanation_correct: A bed is used for sleeping because that's where we go to rest and sleep at night. We need to sleep in a comfortable place like a bed to get enough rest and be energetic the next day.
questions.explanation_incorrect: A bed is not used for eating or playing. It is specifically for sleeping. We need a bed to lie down and close our eyes to get good sleep, which helps us feel fresh and active.

questions.question_text: Family members should fight with each other.
questions.explanation_correct: Family members should not fight with each other. Families are groups of people who love and care for one another. They should be kind and help each other, not fight.
questions.explanation_incorrect: It is not true that family members should fight with each other. Families are supposed to love and support each other, not fight. Fighting and being mean to each other is not good for families. Families should be happy and get along well together.

questions.question_text: We should keep our home clean and tidy.
questions.explanation_correct: It is important to keep our home clean and tidy. This helps us stay healthy and happy. When we keep our home clean, it is easier for us to find things and do our work.
questions.explanation_incorrect: It is not a good idea to keep our home messy and dirty. A clean home is better for us. When our home is clean, we can play safely and easily find the things we need. We should always try to keep our home neat and tidy.

questions.question_text: We take a bath in the kitchen.
questions.explanation_correct: We do not take a bath in the kitchen. We take a bath in the bathroom because the bathroom has a bathtub or shower where we can get clean.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The kitchen is where we cook food, not where we take a bath. The bathroom is the special room in our house where we can take a bath and get clean. We never take a bath in the kitchen.

questions.question_text: Family members love and care for each other.
questions.explanation_correct: Family members love and care for each other because they are a group of people who live together and help one another. They play, share, and enjoy spending time together.
questions.explanation_incorrect: If family members did not love and care for each other, they would not live together or help each other. Families are groups of people who love and support one another, so the statement is true.

questions.question_text: Mother and father are our ___.
questions.explanation_correct: Mother and father are our parents. They are the adults who take care of us and love us. Parents are the most important people in our family.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The answer 'parents' is correct. Mother and father are the parents in our family. They are the grown-ups who live with us and make sure we are happy and healthy. 'Parents' is the right word to fill in the blank.

questions.explanation_correct: The father's father is called the grandfather. This is because a grandfather is the father of your father or mother.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct answer is 'grandfather'. A grandfather is the father of your father or mother. He is not the mother's father, who would be called the grandmother. The answer should be written as 'grandfather' in the exact format requested.

questions.explanation_correct: Mother's mother is your grandmother. This is because your grandmother is the mother of your mother, and she is part of your family.

questions.question_text: We cook food in the ___.
questions.explanation_correct: We cook food in the kitchen because that is the room in the house where the stove, oven, and other cooking equipment are located. The kitchen is the special room for preparing and cooking meals for the family.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The kitchen is the room where we cook food. We do not cook food in the bedroom, bathroom, or living room. The accepted answer format is 'kitchen'.

The bathroom is where we take a bath, not where we sleep. The correct answer is 'bedroom' because that is the room in the house where we have our beds and sleep.

questions.question_text: We take a bath in the ___.

questions.question_text: A family with many members is called a ___ family.
questions.explanation_correct: A family with many members, like grandparents, aunts, uncles, and cousins, is called a joint family. This is because all the family members live together in one big house and take care of each other.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct answer is 'joint' family. A joint family is a big family with many members living together in one house. This is different from a small family with just parents and children, which is called a nuclear family. In a joint family, everyone helps and cares for each other.

questions.question_text: A family with few members is called a ___ family.
questions.explanation_correct: A small family has fewer members, like just a mother, father, and one or two children. This is called a 'small' family because it is not very large or big.
questions.explanation_incorrect: A 'big' family has many members, like a mother, father, several brothers and sisters, and even grandparents. This is called a 'big' family because it has a lot of people. The correct answer is 'small' because a family with just a few members is called a small family.

questions.question_text: We sit on a ___.
questions.explanation_correct: We sit on a chair because chairs are special furniture made for sitting. Chairs have a flat seat and a back to support our body when we want to rest or do activities like eating, reading, or playing.
questions.explanation_incorrect: We do not sit on a bed or a table. A bed is where we sleep, and a table is where we keep things. The correct answer is a chair, which is a piece of furniture with a seat and a back that we use to sit on.

questions.question_text: We sleep on a ___.
questions.explanation_correct: We sleep on a bed because beds are where we rest and sleep at night. Beds are comfortable and cozy, perfect for sleeping soundly.
questions.explanation_incorrect: We do not sleep on a couch or a chair. Those are for sitting, not sleeping. The correct answer is a bed, which is a piece of furniture made for sleeping on. Beds are soft and have a mattress to make us comfortable when we sleep.

questions.question_text: We eat food on a ___.

questions.explanation_incorrect: The answer is 'plate'. We do not eat food on a table or a chair. Plates are special dishes that are used to hold our food when we eat. They are usually made of glass, plastic, or ceramic material.

questions.question_text: Family members ___ and care for each other.
questions.explanation_correct: The answer 'love' is correct because family members care for and love each other. They help and support one another, and enjoy spending time together.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The answer 'care' is not correct. Family members do not just 'care' for each other - they love each other. Love means they really like and want to be with their family, and they will do their best to help and look after each other.

questions.question_text: Put these family members in order from oldest to youngest.
questions.explanation_correct: The correct order is Grandfather, Father, Child because the grandfather is the oldest, then the father is younger than the grandfather, and the child is the youngest.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The incorrect order would be Father, Child, Grandfather. This is wrong because the grandfather is the oldest, then the father is younger than the grandfather, and the child is the youngest. The correct order from oldest to youngest is Grandfather, Father, Child.

questions.question_text: Put in order: What happens at meal time?
questions.explanation_correct: The order is correct because this is how a meal happens. First, we cook the food. Then, we serve the food on plates. Finally, we eat the food.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The order is not correct. First, we cook the food. Then, we eat the food. Finally, we serve the food on plates. This is wrong because we need to serve the food before we can eat it.

questions.question_text: Put in order: What do we do at bedtime?
questions.explanation_correct: The correct order is: Put on pajamas, Brush teeth, Go to bed. This is the correct order because we need to put on our pajamas first, then brush our teeth, and finally go to bed. This is the order we follow every night before going to sleep.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The incorrect order would be: Brush teeth, Put on pajamas, Go to bed. This is not correct because we need to put on our pajamas before brushing our teeth. Brushing our teeth should come after putting on our pajamas and before going to bed.

questions.question_text: Put in order: How do we clean dishes?
questions.explanation_correct: The correct order is: Use soap, Rinse with water, Dry them. This is the right way to clean dishes because we first use soap to scrub the dishes and get them clean. Then we rinse them with water to wash away the soap. Finally, we dry the dishes so they are ready to use again.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The incorrect order is: Rinse with water, Use soap, Dry them. This is not the right way to clean dishes because we need to use soap first to scrub the dishes and get them clean. Then we rinse them with water to wash away the soap. Finally, we dry the dishes so they are ready to use again.

questions.question_text: Put these in order from youngest to oldest.
questions.explanation_correct: A baby is the youngest person, then a child, and finally an adult is the oldest. This is the right order from youngest to oldest.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The order from youngest to oldest is baby, child, then adult. A baby is the smallest and youngest, then a child grows bigger, and an adult is the oldest and biggest person. The correct order is baby, child, adult.
